content: x4 increase single_crochet x8 increase x2 single_crochet x4 30 round 10 single_crochet x4 increase repeat around 36 round 11-12 single_crochet x36 36 round 13 single_crochet x4 decrease repeat around 30 round 14 single_crochet x3 decrease repeat around 24 ears head w/ eyes & eye patches round 15 single_crochet x2 decrease repeat around 18 place eye patches with the safety eyes back not secured yet around round 7-9 and spaced about 7-8 st between the eye patches you can adjust eye placement per your preference start stuffing with polyfill while crocheting along round 16 single_crochet decrease repeat around 12 finish stuffing round 17 decrease around 6 finish off with slip_stitch and sew closed weave tail in sew on ears at around round 11-13 with 5-6 sts between the ears the ears on my squirrels were about 2-3 row above the eye patches change per your preference you can see each of the squirrels have a slightly different appearance extended beige under chin *for muzzle like orange squirrel see pictures change to the following for rounds 2-5 r2 as per pattern above but change to yarn a on last st 12 r3 single_crochet x4 change to yarn b single_crochet 8 change to yarn a 12 r4 single_crochet x3 increase change to yarn b single_crochet x3 increase x2 change to yarn a 15 r5 single_crochet x2 increase single_crochet x2 change to yarn b single_crochet x2 stuffing leave ~10 tail for sewing on head the tummy will be sewn on the flatter side which aligns with the 1st st of each round bottom tail yarn tummy yarn b beige crochet in row use normal decrease
